title: How to get the “PCbook accreditation certificate” - Quora

response.answer_text: In order to be eligible for the PCbook Accreditation Certificate, a person has to meet all the eligibility requirements on his/her PCbook profile. As a mandatory step, a person should meet criteria for PCbook Accreditation in the following areas: Maintaining Good BehaviorContinuous Self Improvement.Maintaining HonestyMaintaining PunctualityMaintaining CommitmentMaintaining TrustworthinessMaintaining Public Satisfaction scoreMaintaining Complaint Resolution ScoreMaintaining Genuine complaint submitted by you scoreMaintaining Honesty Witness scoreOnce all these important factors are well maintained, PCbook considers a person eligible for getting the PCbook Accreditation Certificate.    For business In order to be eligible for the PCbook Accreditation Certificate, a person's business records has to meet all the eligibility requirements on his/her PCbook profile. As a mandatory step, a business should meet our criteria for PCbook Accreditation in the following areas: • Continuous Business Profile Improvement. • Maintaining Good Behavior towards customer • Maintaining Honesty towards customer • Maintaining Punctuality towards customer • Maintaining Commitment towards customer • Maintaining Trustworthiness towards customer • Maintaining highest customer satisfaction scores. Once all these important factors are well maintained, PCbook considers a business eligible for getting the PCbook Accreditation Certificate.

The “PCbook Accreditation Certificate” is a certificate of completion that can help you show up as a better person in front of your friends, relatives, co-workers, potential employers, and clients. The PCbook Accreditation Certificate helps you to demonstrate your personal and career accomplishments to the world.
